text: Aur unn logon ko na nikaliye jo subha-o-shaam apney perwerdigar ki ibadat kertay hain khaas ussi ki raza ka qasad rakhtay hain. Unn ka hisab zara bhi aap kay mutalliq nahi aur aap ka hisab zara bhi unn kay mutalliq nahi kay aap unn ko nikal den. Werna aap zulm kerney walon mein say hojayen gay
